publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3000 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Colin MacIver Campbell MSP-That the Parliament congratulates Colin MacIver Campbell MSP on the birth of Ruairidh Alasdair MacLean Campbell, 7lb 13 oz, his eighth grandchild and fifth grandson, born on 16 April 2002 at 19.45 at Paisley Maternity Hospital to his third son Laurie and daughter-in-law Allison, their second child and first son, and is pleased that mother and baby are doing fine. Supported by: Michael Russell*

S1M-3000 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Colin MacIver Campbell MSP-That the Parliament congratulates Colin MacIver Campbell MSP on the birth of Ruairidh Alasdair MacLean Campbell, 7lb 13 oz, his eighth grandchild and fifth grandson, born on 16 April 2002 at 19.45 at Paisley Maternity Hospital to his third son Laurie and daughter-in-law Allison, their second child and first son and is pleased that mother and baby are doing fine. Supported by: Michael Russell
S1M-3000 Congratulations to Colin MacIver Campbell MSP (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3000 Congratulations to Colin MacIver Campbell MSP (lodged on 17 April 2002) Tricia Marwick*
